website_summaries.verdict: AOC's 27-inch Agon AG271QX monitor supports AMD's FreeSync technology and has a speedy 144Hz refresh rate. Despite skewed greens and narrow viewing angles, it delivers solid gaming performance.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible monitor, Garbage Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning monitor for the price. I really can't fault it in any area regarding the picture. One thing I would say is the speakers built in are absolute garbage, You can't use them for anything. Get yourself a set of separate speakers. I bought a set of Bose Companion 50 speakers and all is good. Didn't take a star off because monitors are all about the picture, not sound. Also remember. THE SCREWS FOR THE ARM ARE TAPED TO THE WRAPPING FOR THE BASE. Everyone seems to miss them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hudson

customer_reviews.title: DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March 2018 and now keep glitching our as it fails to keep the power to the CPU regulated. after a while the computer keeps rebooting until you get fed up and turn it off. I bought this as I perceived it was (for the price) a quality item! Unfortunately Amazon don't have any customer support for this item!
customer_reviews.author: Aliswine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic screen at fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start, the screen is so nice to look at from a shell point of view and picture. Ignore peoples comments when they say they don't like the color, within the menu (which is simple to use with the separate controller) you can tweak a lot of settings from color to brightness. If I was nit picking, the menu is little out dated and (without controller) is little difficult to use but you only go in there once and never again. Over all, well recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this mainly for gaming and am very pleased with all aspects. The stand is especially well designed for looks and adjustment. The display can be set up to personal preferences and quickly changed with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Very good gaming  monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with monitor for the price. I had a number of IPS displays before these which I had to return for various issues. This monitor for the price I am very happy with. Other than the viewing angles I cannot notice any major difference between this and the IPS 165hz variants I had before this. I got this monitor for 340 on an amazon deal and so far have no complaints for the price. Def worth the purchase. I would of happily paid up to 380 for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this monitor. The 1440p 144 Hz is a huge improvement from my old 1080p 60 Hz monitor and the picture quality is incredible. I love the little setting changer pad they give you with this monitor as well. Makes it quick and easy to switch colour setting or 'gaming mode' with a touch of button. Gives you three settings to save as well which is great! Really wasn't sure if the price would be worth it in the end but it definitely was!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: All perfect for gaming. High refresh rate, freesync, fast response, no ghosting, anti-glare surface screen. I will highly recommend this for gaming. If you want to watch movies, pictures or create color accurate content cant recommend this monitor cause of its TN screen panel. Meaning the colours will be washed out and not fully accurate.
